com.gwtplatform.mvp.client.proxy
Interface RevealRootLayoutContentHandler

All Superinterfaces:
EventHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
RootPresenter
public interface RevealRootLayoutContentHandler
extends EventHandler

This is the handler interface for RevealRootLayoutContentEvent. It is used solely by RootPresenter.

Author:
Philippe Beaudoin

Method Summary
 void onRevealRootLayoutContent(RevealRootLayoutContentEvent event)
          Called whenever a presenter wants to sets itself as the root layout content of the application, that is, within GWT's RootLayoutPanel.
 

Method Detail

onRevealRootLayoutContent

void onRevealRootLayoutContent(RevealRootLayoutContentEvent event)
Called whenever a presenter wants to sets itself as the root layout content of the application, that is, within GWT's RootLayoutPanel.

Parameters:
event - The event containing the presenter that wants to bet set as root layout content.
